title: How to Change a Group Name or Description on Facebook: 2 Ways

steps.title: Go to https://facebook.com/groups in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://facebook.com/groups in a web browser. If you're logged in to Facebook, you will see a list of groups you manage, as well as groups you've joined, in the left sidebar. If you're not signed in, follow the on-screen instructions now. You can edit a group description as often as needed, but you can only change the name of a Facebook group once every 28 days. If it has been fewer than 28 days since your last group name edit, you won't be able to edit the group's name. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click the group you want to edit.
steps.content: Click the group you want to edit. Groups you can edit appear under "Groups you manage" in the left panel. You can only edit the description, name, and other details of groups you manage. [2] X Research source If you're not a group admin , you won't see your group under "Groups you manage," and thus cannot change the group description. If you manage a lot of groups, it may be easier to search for the group by name using the "Search groups" bar at the upper-left.

steps.title: Scroll down and click Group Settings.
steps.content: Scroll down and click Group Settings . It's near the middle of the left panel under the "Settings" heading.

steps.title: Click the pencil icon next to "Name and description."
steps.content: Click the pencil icon next to "Name and description." This opens up some editing fields so you can make your changes.

steps.title: Edit the group description and/or name.
steps.content: Edit the group description and/or name. You can change the group's name by editing the "Name" field, and the description in the "Description field.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . Your changes are now saved and will go live immediately.

steps.title: Tap the three-line menu in the Facebook app ☰.
steps.content: Tap the three-line menu in the Facebook app ☰ . It's at the top-right corner of the Facebook app on Android, and at the bottom-right on an iPhone or iPad. You can edit a group description as often as needed, but you can only edit the name of a Facebook Group once every 28 days. If it has been fewer than 28 days since your last group name edit, you won't be able to edit the group's name. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Groups on the menu.
steps.content: Tap Groups on the menu. If you don't see Groups, tap See More to expand more options. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Select your group.
steps.content: Select your group. If the list of groups is long, you can jump to it quickly by typing a few letters of the group name into the "Search group name" field and then tapping it in the search results.

steps.title: Tap the shield with a star inside.
steps.content: Tap the shield with a star inside. As long as you are a group admin, you will see this icon at the top-right corner. This opens the Manage Group page. The icon won't appear if you are not a group admin. Only group admins can change the name and description of the group.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Group settings.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Group settings . It's toward the bottom under the "Settings" heading.

steps.title: Tap Name and description.
steps.content: Tap Name and description . This opens up some editing fields so you can make your changes.

steps.title: Edit the group description and/or name.
steps.content: Edit the group description and/or name. You can change the group's name by tapping the "Group Name" field and entering replacement. You can also change the description by editing the "Description" box.

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . Your changes are now saved and will go live immediately.
